object.name: barrel beer
object.description: A beer barrel has been left here.

object.name: bottle beer
object.description: A beer bottle has been left here.

object.name: bottle ale
object.description: A dark bottle of ale has been left here.

object.name: bottle firebreather
object.description: A bottle of firebreather has been left here.

object.name: bottle local
object.description: A dark bottle has been left here.

object.name: scimitar blade
object.description: Hassan's scimitar lies upon the ground, waiting for its owner.

extra_description.description:
It is quite heavy.  The blade is made of some metal that you can't even
spell.  The edge of the blade looks as if it could cut through anything
or anyone.

object.name: stone
object.description: Somebody left their Clan Stone here.

object.name: potpie pot pie
object.description: A big pot pie has been left here.

object.name: pit
object.description: A pit for sacrifices is in front of the altar.

extra_description.description:
This is where you put money and items to help Doz expand this shrine and
convert more people to the belief of Mota, lord of the gods.

object.name: bread
object.description: A loaf of bread is here. It doesn't look too stale.

object.name: cinnamon roll
object.description: A piping hot cinnamon roll is here. It looks delicious!

object.name: cookies
object.description: A plate of chocolate chip cookies is here.

object.name: danish blueberry
object.description: A scrumptious blueberry danish is here.

object.name: dagger
object.description: A dagger with a long thin blade is here.

object.name: sword small
object.description: A small sword lies here.

object.name: sword long
object.description: A long sword has been left here.

object.name: club
object.description: A stout wooden club is here.

object.name: mace heavy
object.description: A heavy iron mace is here.

object.name: axe hand
object.description: A small hand axe lies forgotten on the floor.

object.name: axe battle
object.description: A large steel axe rests on the ground.

object.name: spear
object.description: A long spear leans against the wall.

object.name: staff
object.description: A stout wooden staff lies on the floor.

object.name: flail
object.description: A small iron flail is here.

object.name: torch
object.description: A large torch.

object.name: lantern
object.description: A hooded brass lantern has been left here.

extra_description.description: They say, "Use 'hold lantern' to activate."

It is a large and robust but somewhat battered oil lantern made from brass,
equipped with a handle to make it handy and a hood to protect its flame.
Some letters have been scratched on its bottom.

object.name: bag
object.description: A small bag.

object.name: box
object.description: A small box.

object.name: scroll cancellation
object.description: A rolled vellum scroll is here.

extra_description.description: Use this scroll to remove magical curses.

object.name: scroll identify
object.description: A scroll has carelessly been left here.

extra_description.description:
The scroll has a magic formula drawn upon it:
     ???
    ?   ?
       ?
      ?
      ?
      *

object.name: potion yellow
object.short_descr: a yellow potion of see invisible
object.description: A small yellow potion has carelessly been left here.

extra_description.description: The potion has a small label 'Detect The Invisible'.

object.name: scroll recall
object.description: A scroll has carelessly been left here.

extra_description.description: The scroll has written a formula of 'Word of Recall' upon it.

object.name: ring protection
object.description: an enchanted ring of protection sits on the floor.

extra_description.description: It's a silver ring set with a gleaming moonstone.

object.name: wand magic missile missiles
object.description: a wooden stick lies on the ground.

extra_description.description: It has a little note that says 'point this end at target'.

extra_description.description: The raft looks very primitive.

extra_description.description: The canoe is fairly light.

object.name: key iron
object.description: An iron key has been left here.

extra_description.description: The iron key is not special.

object.name: key rusty
object.description: A rusty key has been left here.

extra_description.description: The key is a fairly large rusty key.  You notice some fresh dirt on it.

object.name: key wooden
object.description: A wooden key has been left here.

extra_description.description: The wooden key is not special.

object.name: key brass
object.description: A brass key has been left here.

extra_description.description: The brass key is small and looks like it fits a very complicated lock.

object.name: sword long
object.description: A long sword has been left here.

extra_description.description:
This is the ceremonial sword of the Mayor of Midgaard.
A
13 20
A
12 20

object.name: hand cuffs
object.description: A pair of hand cuffs has been left here.

object.name: desk drawer
object.description: A desk is set against the western wall.

extra_description.description: You notice a keyhole in the drawer.
The desk looks very sparse, there is a drawer on the left side.

object.name: safe
object.description: A safe is placed in a dark corner of the room.

extra_description.description: The safe is very heavy.

object.name: silver coins
object.description: A lot of silver is here.

extra_description.description: Looks like at least a thousand coins.

object.name: city key
object.description: The very big City Key is lying here.

extra_description.description:
It is probably the biggest key you have seen in your life. It is made from
polished gold and has various patterns on it along with the Midgaard Coat of
Arms.

object.name: bench
object.description: A white-painted wooden bench is standing here.

extra_description.description:
It is a quite heavy but very comfortable bench.  It is placed with its front
towards the river so you can sit and watch the river and the houses on the
other side.

object.name: fountain water
object.description: A small white fountain gushes forth here.

extra_description.description: It is very nice.  Made from fine white marble.

object.name: coins
object.description: A small pile of coins lies here.

object.name: key steel
object.description: A large steel key has been left here.

extra_description.description: A key of this size must fit a very strong lock.

object.name: skin water buffalo
object.description: A bloated dead buffalo is on the floor.

object.name: letter resignation
object.description: The receptionist's letter of resignation is taped to the wall.

extra_description.description:
The letter is written in a bold and feminine Carolinian hand.

    To whom it may concern,

        Merc Industries has installed a new no-rent save and quit
        system.  Apparently one can now save and quit at any time
        from anywhere inside a town or out.  My services here are
        no longer required.

    Diana the Receptionist

object.name: notice liquidation bank
object.description: The bank's notice of liquidation is taped to the wall.

extra_description.description:
The letter is written in a reserved and dignified Spencer hand.

    To whom it may concern,

        Merc Industries has charmed your money.  Apparently one's
        gold will remain close, even beyond death. We are closing
        down our offices and ATM machines.  Our services here are
        no longer required.

    Midgaard City Bank

object.name: coffee cup cinnamon
object.description: A piping hot cup of cinnamon coffee is here.

extra_description.description: It's a nice flavorful blend, just right for late-night mudding sessions.

object.name: soup bowl
object.short_descr: a bowl of chicken noodle soup
object.description: A nice hot bowl of chicken noodle soup is here.

extra_description.description: This looks like just the thing for a cold!

object.name: bowl beef stew
object.description: A bowl of nice thick beef stew, with lots of vegetables, steams here.

extra_description.description:
This is Kate's special stew, guaranteed to keep hunger pangs away for many
hours.  Care for a bite?

object.name: biscuit
object.description: A yummy biscuit, covered with butter, is here.

extra_description.description: A nice, soft biscuit with just enough butter.  Better buy two.

object.name: beer bottle killian irish red
object.short_descr: a bottle of George Killian's Irish Red
object.description: A dark-tinted bottle of beer is here.

extra_description.description:
It's a fine beer for serious drinkers, complete with the famous horse head
logo.  Worth every penny.

object.name: comfy wooden bed
object.description: A comfy wooden bed is here.

extra_description.description:
This is a standard bed you'll find in most inns. Sleeping in or resting on
it may yield positive results for your health!

object.name: key white
object.description: A white key has been left here.

object.name: ring diamond wedding
object.description: Vanya's diamond wedding ring has been left here.

extra_description.description:
A slender gold band set with a marquise-cut four carat blue-white solitaire.
Inscribed on the inside of the band is: 'Your loving husband, House'.

object.name: band gold wedding
object.description: House's gold wedding band has been left here.

extra_description.description: A wide, plain circle of gold inscribed: 'Your loving wife, Vanya'.
